summary: Provides a lightweight wrapper around the Segment Anything Model (SAM) to enable image‑only decoding for cell segmentation within the MONAI framework. The class manages input resizing, checkpoint loading, and optional extraction of encoder features, offering a simplified interface for integrating SAM into biomedical imaging pipelines.
business_intent: Facilitate rapid deployment of SAM‑based cell segmentation in research and clinical workflows by abstracting model initialization, preprocessing, and feature extraction, thereby accelerating development of AI‑driven pathology and microscopy analysis tools.
